PersistentSheafLaplacian#

Persistent Sheaf Laplacian#

Constructor

PersistentSheafLaplacian([sst, boundaries, ...])

Persistent Laplacian made with a cellular sheaf.

Methods#

PersistentSheafLaplacian.set_boundaries_filtrations(...)

If the boundaries and filtrations were not set in the constructor, set them here.

PersistentSheafLaplacian.spectra([dim, a, ...])

Compute the eigenvalues of L_{dim}^{a,b} or for every tuple (dim, a, b) in request_list.
